mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.actyw_id AS "actYwId", a.p_name AS "pName", a.short_name AS "shortName", a.declare_id AS "declareId", a.pro_type AS "proType", a.pro_category AS "proCategory", a.type AS "type", a.is_send AS "isSend", a.step AS "step", a.level AS "level", a.introduction AS "introduction", a.financing_stat AS "financingStat", a.final_status AS "finalStatus", a.end_gnode_id AS "endGnodeId", a.end_gnode_vesion AS "endGnodeVesion", a.state AS "state", a.team_id AS "teamId", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.pro_mark AS "proMark", a.source AS "source", a.competition_number AS "competitionNumber", a.project_source AS "projectSource", a.sub_time AS "subTime", a.grade AS "grade", a.g_score AS "gScore", a.year AS "year", a.final_result AS "finalResult", a.sub_status AS "subStatus", a.stage AS "stage", a.impdata AS "impdata", a.project_level_dict AS "projectLevelDict", a.gc_track AS "gcTrack", a.achievement_tf as achievementTf, a.achievement_user as achievementUser, a.co_creation as coCreation, a.idea_stage as ideaStage, a.belongs_field as belongsField, a.bank_name as bankName, a.bank_number as bankNumber, a.ranking,
sa.id AS "logo.id", sa.type AS "logo.ftype", sa.file_step AS "logo.ffileStep", sa.uid AS "logo.uid", sa.url AS "logo.url", sa.name AS "logo.name", sa.size AS "logo.size", sa.gnode_id AS "logo.gnodeId", sa.suffix AS "logo.suffix", sa.update_date AS "logo.updateDate", sa.update_by AS "logo.updateBy.id", sa.create_date AS "logo.createDate", sa.create_by AS "logo.createBy.id",
yw.id AS "actYw.id", yw.rel_id AS "actYw.relId", yw.group_id AS "actYw.groupId", yw.flow_id AS "actYw.flowId", yw.deployment_id AS "actYw.deploymentId", yw.is_deploy AS "actYw.isDeploy", yw.status AS "status", yw.show_time AS "actYw.showTime", yw.key_Type AS "actYw.keyType",
pp.id AS "actYw.proProject.id", pp.menu_rid AS "actYw.proProject.menuRid", pp.category_rid AS "actYw.proProject.categoryRid", pp.content AS "actYw.proProject.content", pp.project_name AS "actYw.proProject.projectName", pp.project_mark AS "actYw.proProject.projectMark", pp.state AS "actYw.proProject.state", pp.pro_type AS "actYw.proProject.proType", pp.type AS "actYw.proProject.type", pp.pro_category AS "actYw.proProject.proCategory", pp.level AS "actYw.proProject.level", pp.final_status AS "actYw.proProject.finalStatus", pp.start_date AS "actYw.proProject.startDate", pp.end_date AS "actYw.proProject.endDate", pp.node_state AS "actYw.proProject.nodeState", pp.node_start_date AS "actYw.proProject.nodeStartDate", pp.node_end_date AS "actYw.proProject.nodeEndDate", pp.update_date AS "actYw.proProject.updateDate", pp.update_by AS "actYw.proProject.updateBy.id", pp.create_date AS "actYw.proProject.createDate", pp.create_by AS "actYw.proProject.createBy.id", pp.del_flag AS "actYw.proProject.delFlag",
u.id AS "deuser.id", u.company_id AS "deuser.company.id", u.office_id AS "deuser.office.id", u.login_name AS "deuser.loginName", u.password AS "deuser.password", u.no AS "deuser.no", u.sex AS "deuser.sex", u.name AS "deuser.name", u.email AS "deuser.email", u.phone AS "deuser.phone", u.mobile AS "deuser.mobile", u.user_type AS "deuser.userType", u.login_ip AS "deuser.loginIp", u.login_date AS "deuser.loginDate", u.remarks AS "deuser.remarks", u.login_flag AS "deuser.loginFlag", u.photo AS "deuser.photo", u.professional AS "deuser.professional", u.professionalName AS "deuser.professionalName", u.school AS "deuser.school", u.create_by AS "deuser.createBy.id", u.create_date AS "deuser.deuser.name", u.update_by AS "deuser.updateBy.id", u.update_date AS "deuser.updateDate", u.del_flag AS "deuser.delFlag", u.id_type AS "deuser.idType", u.birthday AS "deuser.birthday", u.id_no AS "deuser.idNumber", u.national AS "deuser.national", u.political AS "deuser.political", u.country AS "deuser.country", u.qq AS "deuser.qq", u.education AS "deuser.education", u.degree AS "deuser.degree", u.views AS "deuser.views", u.likes AS "deuser.likes", o6.name AS "deuser.office.name", op.id AS "deuser.subject.id", op.name AS "deuser.subject.name",
t.name AS "team.name", t.number AS "team.number", t.member_num AS "team.memberNum", t.first_teacher AS "team.firstTeacher", t.sch_teacher_names AS "team.schTeacherNames", t.ent_teacher_names AS "team.entTeacherNames"

LEFT JOIN act_yw yw ON yw.id = a.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.id = yw.rel_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.declare_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o6 ON o6.id = u.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_office op ON op.id = u.professional LEFT JOIN team t ON t.id = a.team_id LEFT JOIN sys_attachment sa ON sa.uid = a.id and sa.type='11' and sa.file_step='1101'
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u. NAME SEPARATOR '/') FROM team_user_history t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id AND t.user_type = '1' WHERE t.pro_id = a.id)
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u. NAME SEPARATOR '/') FROM team_user_history t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id AND t.user_type = '2' WHERE t.pro_id = a.id)
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS id, a.team_id AS teamId, a.introduction, a.p_name AS "pName", a.declare_id AS "declareId", a.year AS year, s.label AS sourceName,
AS snames,
AS tnames FROM pro_model a LEFT JOIN sys_dict s on a.type=s.value and s.type='project_style'
a.del_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id AS id, a.team_id AS teamId, a.introduction, a.p_name AS "pName", a.declare_id AS "declareId", a.year AS year, s.label AS sourceName,
AS snames,
AS tnames FROM pro_model a LEFT JOIN sys_dict s on a.type=s.value and s.type='competition_type'
a.del_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM pro_model a
WHERE a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.actyw_Id = #{actYwId}
AND (a.state != '1' || a.state is null)

SELECT
FROM pro_model a
WHERE a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.actyw_Id = #{actYwId}

SELECT
FROM pro_model a
WHERE a.del_flag = '0' and yw.is_pre_release != '1'
AND yw.group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT
FROM pro_model a
a.del_flag = 0 AND a.state = '1'
AND a.actyw_id = #{actYwId}
AND (a.proc_ins_id is null or a.proc_ins_id ='')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy} ${page.orderByType}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM pro_model a LEFT JOIN team t ON a.team_id=t.id WHERE (a.state is null or a.state='0' or a.state='') AND a.team_id=#{teamId} AND a.del_flag='0' AND t.del_flag='0'

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "pName", a.leader AS "declareId", a.leader AS "deuser.id", '1,' AS "proType", dpp.type AS "type", a.team_id AS "teamId", a.actyw_id AS "actYwId", a.actyw_id AS "actYw.id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.status AS "state", a.introduction AS "introduction", t.name AS "team.name", t.state AS "team.state", t.summary AS "team.summary", t.enterprise_teacher_num AS "team.enterpriseTeacherNum", t.school_teacher_num AS "team.schoolTeacherNum", t.member_num AS "team.memberNum", t.local_college AS "team.localCollege" FROM project_declare a LEFT JOIN team t ON t.id = a.team_id LEFT JOIN act_yw day ON day.id = a.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project dpp ON dpp.id = day.rel_id WHERE a.leader = #{uid} AND a.del_flag='0' AND a.proc_ins_id is not null UNION ALL SELECT a.id AS "id", a.p_name AS "pName", a.declare_id AS "declareId", a.declare_id AS "deuser.id", ppp.pro_type AS "proType", ppp.type AS "type", a.team_id AS "teamId", a.actyw_id AS "actYwId", a.actyw_id AS "actYw.id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.state AS "state", a.introduction AS "introduction", t.name AS "team.name", t.state AS "team.state", t.summary AS "team.summary", t.enterprise_teacher_num AS "team.enterpriseTeacherNum", t.school_teacher_num AS "team.schoolTeacherNum", t.member_num AS "team.memberNum", t.local_college AS "team.localCollege" FROM pro_model a LEFT JOIN team t ON t.id = a.team_id LEFT JOIN act_yw pay ON pay.id = a.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project ppp ON ppp.id = pay.rel_id WHERE a.declare_id = #{uid} AND a.del_flag='0' AND a.sub_status='1' UNION ALL SELECT a.id AS "id", a.p_name AS "pName", a.declare_id AS "declareId", a.declare_id AS "deuser.id", '7,' AS "proType", gpp.type AS "type", a.team_id AS "teamId", a.actyw_id AS "actYwId", a.actyw_id AS "actYw.id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.audit_state AS "state", a.introduction AS "introduction", t.name AS "team.name", t.state AS "team.state", t.summary AS "team.summary", t.enterprise_teacher_num AS "team.enterpriseTeacherNum", t.school_teacher_num AS "team.schoolTeacherNum", t.member_num AS "team.memberNum", t.local_college AS "team.localCollege" FROM g_contest a LEFT JOIN team t ON t.id = a.team_id LEFT JOIN act_yw gay ON gay.id = a.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project gpp ON gpp.id = gay.rel_id WHERE a.declare_id =#{uid} AND a.del_flag='0' AND a.proc_ins_id is not null

SELECT p.promodel_id AS "pmId", p.gn_id AS "gnodeId", a.id, a.office_id AS "office.id", a.name, a.rinit, a.rtype, a.regval, a.rid, a.enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.role_group AS roleGroup, a.biz_type AS bizType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM ( SELECT ap.del_flag, ap.promodel_id, ap.gnode_id AS "gn_id" FROM ( SELECT ai.* FROM act_yw_audit_info ai ORDER BY ai.create_date DESC ) ap GROUP BY ap.promodel_id ORDER BY ap.create_date DESC ) p LEFT JOIN act_yw_grole gr ON p.gn_id = gr.gnode_id LEFT JOIN sys_role a ON a.id = gr.role_id
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND p.promodel_id in
#{id}
GROUP BY p.promodel_id, gr.role_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pro_model( id, actyw_id, p_name, short_name, declare_id, pro_type, type, is_send, step, pro_category, level, introduction, financing_stat, final_status, end_gnode_id, end_gnode_vesion, team_id, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, del_flag, proc_ins_id, pro_mark, source, competition_number, sub_time, sub_status, stage, impdata, project_source, grade, state, g_score, project_level_dict, year, final_result, gc_track, achievement_tf, achievement_user, co_creation, idea_stage, belongs_field, bank_name, bank_number, ranking ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{actYwId}, #{pName}, #{shortName}, #{declareId}, #{proType}, #{type}, #{isSend}, #{step}, #{proCategory}, #{level}, #{introduction}, #{financingStat}, #{finalStatus}, #{endGnodeId}, #{endGnodeVesion}, #{teamId}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{procInsId}, #{proMark}, #{source}, #{competitionNumber}, #{subTime}, #{subStatus}, #{stage}, #{impdata}, #{projectSource}, #{grade}, #{state}, #{gScore}, #{projectLevelDict}, #{year}, #{finalResult}, #{gcTrack}, #{achievementTf}, #{achievementUser}, #{coCreation}, #{ideaStage}, #{belongsField}, #{bankName}, #{bankNumber}, #{ranking} )

INSERT INTO pro_model( id, actyw_id, p_name, short_name, declare_id, pro_type, type, is_send, step, pro_category, level, introduction, financing_stat, final_status, end_gnode_id, end_gnode_vesion, team_id, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, del_flag, proc_ins_id, pro_mark, source, competition_number, sub_time, sub_status, stage, impdata, project_source, grade, state, g_score, project_level_dict, year, final_result, gc_track, achievement_tf, achievement_user, co_creation, idea_stage, belongs_field, tenant_id, bank_name, bank_number, ranking ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{actYwId}, #{pName}, #{shortName}, #{declareId}, #{proType}, #{type}, #{isSend}, #{step}, #{proCategory}, #{level}, #{introduction}, #{financingStat}, #{finalStatus}, #{endGnodeId}, #{endGnodeVesion}, #{teamId}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{procInsId}, #{proMark}, #{source}, #{competitionNumber}, #{subTime}, #{subStatus}, #{stage}, #{impdata}, #{projectSource}, #{grade}, #{state}, #{gScore}, #{projectLevelDict}, #{year}, #{finalResult}, #{gcTrack}, #{achievementTf}, #{achievementUser}, #{coCreation}, #{ideaStage}, #{belongsField}, #{tenantId}, #{bankName}, #{bankNumber}, #{ranking} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pro_model SET del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id} and sub_status='0'
mapper.select: select a.id from pro_model a where a.pro_type=#{protype} and a.type=#{subtype} and a.del_flag='0' and a.declare_id=#{uid} and a.sub_status='0' and (a.state!='1' or a.state is null) order by a.create_date desc limit 1
mapper.update: update team_user_history t inner join pro_model p on p.id=t.pro_id set t.del_flag='1' where p.actyw_id=#{actywid}
update pro_report t inner join pro_model p on p.id=t.promodel_id set t.del_flag='1' where p.actyw_id=#{actywid}
mapper.select: select a.proc_ins_id from pro_model a where a.actyw_id=#{actywid} and a.sub_status='1' and a.del_flag='0' and a.proc_ins_id is not null
mapper.update: update team_user_history t inner join pro_model p on p.id=t.pro_id set t.del_flag='1' where p.id=#{id}
update pro_report t inner join pro_model p on p.id=t.promodel_id set t.del_flag='1' where p.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from pro_model a where a.pro_type=#{protype} and a.type=#{type} and a.p_name=#{name} and a.sub_status='1' and a.del_flag='0'

SELECT count(1) FROM pro_model a WHERE a.competition_number = #{number} AND a.del_flag = '0'
and a.id!=#{id}

SELECT a.id proModelId, a.p_name, a.year, a.stage, a.pro_type, a.type, a.pro_category, (CASE WHEN (a.pro_type = '1,') THEN a.final_status WHEN (a.pro_type = '7,') THEN a.level ELSE '' END) AS "level", a.short_name, a.introduction introduction, t.id AS teamId, t.name AS teamName, o6.name "office_name", lstu.name "leader.name", lstu.no "leader.no", lop.name "leader.professional", lss.enterDate "leader.enterDate", lss.graduation "leader.graduation", sd.label "leader.education", lstu.id_no "leader.id_no", lstu.mobile "leader.mobile", lstu.email "leader.email"
FROM pro_model a LEFT JOIN act_yw yw ON yw.id = a.actyw_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.declare_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o6 ON o6.id = u.office_id
LEFT JOIN team t ON t.id = a.team_id /** 团队负责人 **/
LEFT JOIN sys_user lstu ON lstu.id = a.declare_id LEFT JOIN sys_student_expansion lss ON lstu.id = lss.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_office lop ON lop.id = lstu.professional LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd ON lstu.education = sd.value AND sd.type = 'enducation_level'
yw.id = #{actYwId} AND a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.year = #{year}
AND o6.id = #{deuser.office.id}
AND ( a.p_name LIKE concat('%',#{queryStr},'%') OR a.competition_number LIKE concat('%',#{queryStr},'%') OR u.name LIKE concat('%',#{queryStr},'%') )
AND a.id in
#{id}
GROUP BY a.id
mapper.update: update pro_model set is_send =#{isSend} where id=#{id}
update pro_model set ranking =#{ranking} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.id FROM pro_model a where a.ranking = #{ranking} and a.del_flag ='0' and a.id !=#{id} and a.actyw_id=#{actYwId}
